channel.title: Logging Out
channel.description: Whenever someone mass click log out it dc's everyone and doesnt stop doing it... How do I make it so you can only press log out once every like... 10 seconds without it doing any time of action.

item.title: Logging Out
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

lesterknome:

Probably client side - check the logout packet

It worked before, then I added a bunch of stuff, and went threw and removed a bunch of things, I might have removed something, or added something to prevent yourself from lagging out. But if I add the timer to see if it will make it from stopping that.

[quote=“Owned_Pl0xs, post:4, topic:324727”][quote author=lesterknome link=topic=421083.msg3092614#msg3092614 date=1263008986]
Probably client side - check the logout packet
[/quote]

No, sorry idiot.

Declare:

boolean loggedOut;

Then find case 2458, add this add the top of the case:

if (!loggedOut) {

And under that put:

loggedOut = true;

And then that makes it so itll only work when you press it once.

Don’t forget to put another } to close it.[/quote]

I will try adding this, if it doesn’t work, I will scratch my head and say Fuck my life. If it does work Sweet deal, thanks in advance if it does.

Read full topic

item.title: Logging Out
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

lesterknome:

Probably client side - check the logout packet

No, sorry idiot.

Declare:

boolean loggedOut;

Then find case 2458, add this add the top of the case:

if (!loggedOut) {

And under that put:

loggedOut = true;

And then that makes it so itll only work when you press it once.

Don’t forget to put another } to close it.

Read full topic
